title: [LCU] No audio coming from the game
body:
Disabling and then re-enabling sounds didn't work.
Restarting the client didn't work either.

What should I do? Would a client repair fix my problem?

Edit: I run a client repair and it didn't fix it.

replies.body:
Have you checked your Volume Mixer? Launch into a custom match, then use [**this guide**](https://www.howtogeek.com/244963/how-to-adjust-the-volume-for-individual-apps-in-windows/) to ensure that your volume mixer doesn't have League at a low volume or muted.

Let me know if this helped.
